result.name: north-sea-whitefish-2011-12-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
One of a time-series to develop a North Sea survey to compare the catch rate 
of our whitefish species using an otter trawl on hard grounds and a scraper 
trawl on soft grounds. Detailed measurements will be made of cod, whiting, 
haddock and possibly plaice.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: North Sea Whitefish 2011/12 - Fisheries Science Partnership
